title: Portfolio
description: Personal portfolio website. Includes personal information, skills, work experience, certificates, and projects.
Provides fast navigation and a responsive design for a seamless viewing experience on any device.

title: SmileBar
description: Commercial team project by SoftRyzen. Responsive, cross-browser website for a professional dental cleaning studio in Lviv. It uses the Sanity administrative panel and Telegram API.

title: Car Rental
description: On the site, the possibility of filtering cars and adding them to favorites has been                                implemented. The project used Emotion-styled

title: Carp Travel
description: Website is a business card offering active recreation in the Carpathians. Features: Responsive Design, Swiper Integration. The project used Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form

title: Goose Track
description: Event calendar management application! The project has Google-authorization. Stylized using Emotion-styled
role: Frontend Team Lead, Scrum Master, Developer

title: Bookshelf
description: A platform for searching and buying books. Website with a responsive layout. App component with Public and Private routes, AuthPage page logic.

title: Mimino
description: Website of the hotel and restaurant complex. Adaptive layout and adaptive graphics were implemented. Build project on github, check for build errors and live page performance.

title: WebStudio
description: Business card site. Adaptive layout and adaptive graphics are implemented in the project.

title: Phonebook
description: Application for storing contacts with authorization. The project used Emotion-styled.
